resources.string: We are sorry. Your device does not have an accelerometer, so the tests cannot be performed.
Are you sure you want to delete this user?
Stand with the device on your chest without moving until you hear a beep. Follow the voice instructions during all the tests.
There are three phases. Put your feet together side by side for 10 seconds for the first phase.
Put the heel of one foot at the height of the big toe of the opposite foot for the second phase.
Put the heel of one foot in contact with the tip of the other foot for the third phase.
Try not to lean, if you do, the test will end.
While standing, touch the screen and follow the voice instructions.
Travel a distance of 4 meters. Once you reach the end, do not move until instructed.
Repeat the same process in the opposite direction.
Sit in a chair with your arms crossed over your chest.
If you do it with the mobile in the chest, try to get up and sit twice following the voice instructions.
After this, from the initial position, get up and sit 5 times in a row.
Need to calibrate. While standing, put the phone on your chest and do not move until a beep sounds. Press any part of the screen to start.
Phase 1. Put one foot next to the other and do not move for 10 seconds. Touch the screen to start.
Good. Phase 2, semi-tandem position. Touch the screen to start.
Good. Phase 3, tandem position. Touch the screen to start.
End of balance test. Touch the screen to continue.
You have moved. End of the test. Touch the screen to continue.
With the phone on your chest, touch the screen and walk 4 meters. When you finish, do not move until you hear the signal.
Good. Now repeat the process in the opposite direction. Touch the screen to start.
End of gait speed test. Touch the screen to continue.
Error. No movement detected. Touch the repeat button to try again or touch any part of the screen to continue.
Where do you want to place the phone?
It is necessary to calibrate the device. Sit in a chair and follow the instructions. Touch the screen to start.
End of calibrating. Now, you can stand up and sit down 5 times in a row. Start whenever you want.
And five. End of chair stand test. Touch the screen to continue.
The movement was not carried out with the necessary speed. Touch the repeat button to try again or touch any part of the screen to continue.
Hook the device in the leg or put it inside a pocket. Then, get up 5 times and sit back down. Touch the screen when you are ready.
